reviewText: If you're not into Snake Charming Pentecostal smoke & mirrors form of Christianity & you want a more cerebral intellectually motivated form of Christianity then Ravi Zacharias is the man to go to. He has a collegial yet understandable approach to explaining the differences between world religions and why Christianity sets itself apart from them. He helps to understand why Western Culture is advanced & how certain religious beliefs can slow the advancement of a society.
I used this in an apologetics class comparing world religions. It is clear and very helpful. The students liked it.
